aspectran.description: | | {{bold}}--- The simplest Hello World application created with Aspectran ---{{bold:off}} | |{{underline}}Built-in commands for this console application:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}desc on{{fg:off}} - Display a description of the command | {{green}}desc off{{fg:off}} - Turn off display of description for the command | {{green}}restart{{fg:off}} - Restart this console application | {{green}}help{{fg:off}} - Show the description message that was displayed at startup | {{green}}quit{{fg:off}} - Exit from this console application | |{{underline}}Commands that can run the examples:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}hello{{fg:off}} - It prints the words "Hello World" to the console. |
